item.title: 2021 ARA Hamfest is on!
item.author: admin@w3cwc.com (Antietam Radio Association)
item.description: Thanks to Covid-19, the entire world faced a devastating 2020 – it seemed that the entire world was put on a major pause. The year 2021 shows that people seem to have a little more confidence to step outside, now that the health and government officials have had a chance to get vaccines and other safeguards in place.
